reviews.review: Um Jogo Muito Bom Fico Feliz em Joga-lo!

Uh, shooty game I guess?

Community servers are the best part of this game.
Community with good servers: www.joinsg.net

There is alot wrong with this video game. But it is sometimes fun to play with friends. Would only recommend if playing with a group of people.
Valve has to do something to improve the quality of the matches. Often will you get matched on a mediocre server with aweful connectivity and playing with people in other regions.

This leads to many frustrating moments.

P.S: Не повторяйте моих ошибок, сохраните деньги на школьный обед.
